days.text: Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches at first. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 easterly winds, becoming force 3 to 4 northerly winds.
